ygData.subject: Re: Piercing or blunt? Fanged Skull Stiletto
ygData.msgSnippet: Fanged Skull Stiletto  -  sorry. ... From: Keith Wiseman  Great weapon:  dmg 12, delay 22, and weight 5 Haven t heard whether it is
ygData.messageBody:
Fanged Skull Stiletto - sorry.

-----Original Message-----
From: Keith Wiseman <keithw@...>

Great weapon: dmg 12, delay 22, and weight 5
Haven't heard whether it is magical or not, if so, it is
easily THE best
weapon in game for mage classes because of its stats AND it
frees up your
other hand. I have heard where to get it but have
forgotten, sorry. But
what I do remember is that it is designed to be tough to get
until you are
Lvl 40+. Better make interim weapon plans if you are still
in the teens
like me ))
